scripts.pre-deploy: cp package.json layers/nodejs/package.json && cd layers/nodejs && npm i --production&&cd ../../gatsby-plugins/nodejs&&npm i --production
scripts.pre-deploy:windows: copy package.json layers\nodejs\package.json && cd layers\nodejs && npm i --production
scripts.install: exit 0 && npm v gatsby dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/gatsby
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-source-yuque&&npm run install-gatsby-source-filesystem&&npm run install-valid-url&&npm run install-pretty-bytes&&npm run install-md5-file&&npm run install-queue&&npm run install-dayjs&&npm run install-html-entities&&npm run install-gray-matter&&npm run install-section-matter&&npm run install-kind-of&&npm run install-extend-shallow&&npm run install-is-extendable&&npm run install-is-plain-object&&npm run install-assign-symbols&&npm run install-strip-bom-string
scripts.install-source-yuque: npm v @jeff-tian/gatsby-source-yuque@2.1.6 dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mkdir -p node_modules/@jeff-tian&&mv package node_modules/@jeff-tian/gatsby-source-yuque
scripts.install-gatsby-source-filesystem: npm v gatsby-source-filesystem dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/gatsby-source-filesystem
scripts.install-valid-url: npm v valid-url dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/valid-url
scripts.install-pretty-bytes: npm v pretty-bytes@5.4.1 dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/pretty-bytes
scripts.install-md5-file: npm v md5-file dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/md5-file
scripts.install-queue: npm v queue dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/queue
scripts.install-dayjs: npm v dayjs dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/dayjs
scripts.install-html-entities: npm v html-entities@1.2.1 dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/html-entities
scripts.install-gray-matter: npm v gray-matter dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/gray-matter
scripts.install-section-matter: npm v section-matter dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/section-matter
scripts.install-kind-of: npm v kind-of dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/kind-of
scripts.install-extend-shallow: npm v extend-shallow dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/extend-shallow
scripts.install-is-extendable: npm v is-extendable dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/is-extendable
scripts.install-is-plain-object: npm v is-plain-object dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/is-plain-object
scripts.install-assign-symbols: npm v assign-symbols dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/assign-symbols
scripts.install-strip-bom-string: npm v strip-bom-string dist.tarball | xargs curl | tar -xz&&mv package node_modules/strip-bom-string
